name: fast-i18n-scan
description: Fast and efficient internationalization scanning library for JavaScript/TypeScript projects, written in Rust

scripts.build: napi build --platform --release --features napi && cargo build --release --features cli && node scripts/prepare-binary.js
scripts.build:debug: napi build --platform --features napi && cargo build --features cli && node scripts/prepare-binary.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: napi prepublish -t npm && cargo build --release --features cli && node scripts/prepare-binary.js

author: Your Name <your.email@example.com>
